perksWithImages.name: Hex: Pentimento
perksWithImages.description:
You see the aura of cleansed totems and can Rekindle each Totem once.

While a Totem is Rekindled, Survivors Heal and Repair {0}% slower +{1}% for each additional Rekindled Totem.

If all five totems are Rekindled simultaneously, all Totems are permanently blocked by The Entity.

Survivors cursed by this perk see the auras of Rekindled Totems within {2} meters.

perksWithImages.name: Mindbreaker
perksWithImages.description:
Your distressing presence drains and weakens your prey.

While repairing generators, Survivors are afflicted by the Blindness and Exhausted status effect.

Any existing Exhausted status effect timers are paused while the Survivor is repairing a generator. After ending the repair action, the Survivor is afflicted by the Blindness and Exhausted status effect for {1} seconds.

Blindness prevents Survivors from seeing auras.

Exhausted prevents Survivors from activating exhausting perks.

perksWithImages.name: Quick Gambit
perksWithImages.description:
When you have a Killer's attention, you know how to keep it; others can be confident they won't be interrupted any time soon.

When you are chased by the Killer, see the aura of other Survivors. Any Survivor repairing a generator gains a {0}% repair speed bonus.

This perk goes on cooldown for {1} seconds when you lose a health state.

perksWithImages.name: Teamwork: Power of Two
perksWithImages.description:
It’s hard to keep up with you, but it doesn’t stop people from trying.

When you finish healing another Survivor, you both gain {0}% Haste as long as you stay within {1} meters of each other.

This effect lingers for 4 seconds when leaving the range.

This effect does not stack.

Haste increases Survivor movement speed.
